label: A2B2C_mC20_15_ac_f_e-001
title: Ag$_{2}$PbO$_{2}$ Structure
comments: (Bystr\"{o}m, 1950) gives the structure in the $I2/c$ setting of space group \#15.  We have used FINDSYM to change this to the standard $C2/c$ setting.  This conversion involved a rotation of the axis, and placed the origin on what had been an Ag (4d) site, transforming it to Ag (4a).
